title: Paris Belleville courtyard loft
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Self contained studio onto courtyard garden

Available from late August

Includes gas central heating, electricity and high speed wireless internet. €1095 per month

The loft has pine floors and is overlooked by a mezzanine double bedroom. There are windows onto a leafy courtyard and a very quite side street. There is an open plan kitchen lounge area downstairs with halogen hobs, oven, and fridge-freezer, kitchenware and utensils, and washing machine. There is a comfortable sofa-bed, chairs, occasional table and stools. Upstairs there is a double bed, complete with duvet, pillows, sheets, and towels,

A short walk from Metro Belleville, a modern sports centre and swimming pool

There are a variety of restaurants, brasseries, bars, galleries and cafes within a few minutes walk

Please e-mail me first, text message, telephone or via whatsapp
